data.name: XAccessibleAction
desc: Implement this interface to give access to actions that can be executed for accessible objects.

Every accessible object that can be manipulated beyond its methods exported over the accessibility API should support this interface to expose all actions that it can perform. Each action can be performed or be queried for a description or associated key bindings.

methods.name: doAccessibleAction
desc: Perform the specified Action on the object.

methods.name: getAccessibleActionCount
desc: Returns the number of accessible actions available in this object.
If there are more than one, the first one is considered the \"default\" action of the object.

methods.name: getAccessibleActionDescription
desc: Returns a description of the specified action of the object.

methods.name: getAccessibleActionKeyBinding
desc: Returns a key binding object, if there is one, associated with the specified action.
Note that there can be several alternative key bindings for an action. See XAccessibleKeyBinding for more information about how key bindings are represented.
